headline.print_headline: Kenyan Court Orders Deportation of Two Iranians Facing Terrorism Charges
headline.main: Kenyan Court Orders Deportation of Two Iranians Facing Terrorism Charges

snippet: A Kenyan court on Wednesday ordered two Iranian nationals facing charges of filming Israel's embassy in Nairobi for the purpose of terrorism to be deported back to Iran, a public prosecutor said....
lead_paragraph: A Kenyan court on Wednesday ordered two Iranian nationals facing charges of filming Israel's embassy in Nairobi for the purpose of terrorism to be deported back to Iran, a public prosecutor said.

headline.print_headline: Uganda Charges Traditional Leader at Center of Unrest With Terrorism
headline.main: Uganda Charges Traditional Leader at Center of Unrest With Terrorism

snippet: A Ugandan traditional leader was charged with terrorism on Tuesday after clashes between his guards and Ugandan security forces last month left at least 62 people dead, court papers seen by Reuters showed....
lead_paragraph: A Ugandan traditional leader was charged with terrorism on Tuesday after clashes between his guards and Ugandan security forces last month left at least 62 people dead, court papers seen by Reuters showed.

headline.print_headline: Afghan President and Trump Discuss Terrorism
headline.main: Afghan President and Trump Discuss Terrorism

snippet: The Afghan government says U.S. President-elect Donald Trump and Afghan President Ashraf Ghani have emphasized their joint commitment to fighting terrorism in a phone conversation....
lead_paragraph: The Afghan government says U.S. President-elect Donald Trump and Afghan President Ashraf Ghani have emphasized their joint commitment to fighting terrorism in a phone conversation.

headline.print_headline: Pope's Christmas Message Offers Hope in World Hit by Terrorism, War
headline.main: Pope's Christmas Message Offers Hope in World Hit by Terrorism, War

snippet: Pope Francis on Sunday offered a Christmas hope for peace in a world lacerated by war and terrorism, urging people to remember migrants, refugees and those hit by economic instability caused by "idolatry of money"....
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis on Sunday offered a Christmas hope for peace in a world lacerated by war and terrorism, urging people to remember migrants, refugees and those hit by economic instability caused by "idolatry of money".

headline.print_headline: Turkey's Erodgan Promises to Continue Fight Against Terrorism
headline.main: Turkey's Erodgan Promises to Continue Fight Against Terrorism

snippet: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Sunday said the government would continue its battle against terrorism "until the end", a day after a twin bombing outside an Istanbul soccer stadium killed 38 people....
lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Sunday said the government would continue its battle against terrorism "until the end", a day after a twin bombing outside an Istanbul soccer stadium killed 38 people.

headline.main: 2 in UK Court Charged With Preparing an Act of Terrorism

snippet: Two people have appeared in a London court charged with a variety of terrorism-related offenses....
lead_paragraph: Two people have appeared in a London court charged with a variety of terrorism-related offenses.

headline.print_headline: Police Arrest 6 in UK on Suspicion of Terrorism Offenses
headline.main: Police Arrest 6 in UK on Suspicion of Terrorism Offenses

snippet: Police have arrested six people in Britain on suspicion of preparing acts of terrorism....
lead_paragraph: Police have arrested six people in Britain on suspicion of preparing acts of terrorism.

snippet: Voici le récit des attentats de Paris, raconté par ceux qui les ont vécus. “Moi j’arriverai toujours à vivre avec le fait que j’ai vu des portables qui sonnaient avec marqué ‘papa,’ ‘maman’ dessus, sur des morts. Mais les parent...
lead_paragraph: Voici le récit des attentats de Paris, raconté par ceux qui les ont vécus. “Moi j’arriverai toujours à vivre avec le fait que j’ai vu des portables qui sonnaient avec marqué ‘papa,’ ‘maman’ dessus, sur des morts. Mais les parents, eux, ils vivront avec la disparition définitive de leurs proches.”

byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden, Benoît Morenne, Liz Alderman, Dan Bilefsky, Rachel Donadio, Martin de Bourmont et Daphné Anglès ont contribué à ce reportage.

headline.print_headline: Flagged 2 Times, Bombing Suspect Passed Scrutiny
headline.main: Flagged Two Times in 2014, Ahmad Rahami Passed Scrutiny

snippet: Mr. Rahami, accused of carrying out bombings in New York and New Jersey last weekend, had drawn federal attention after he traveled to Pakistan and his father reported concerns....

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

abstract: Law enforcement officials reveal Ahmad Khan Rahami, suspect accused of bombings in New York and New Jersey, was flagged by custom officials in March 2014 upon his return to United States from almost year-long trip to Pakistan; was also flagged five months later when his father alerted police, concerned over his son's terrorist sympathies, but agents did not pursue deeper inquiry; investigators are scrutinizing Rahami's travel history as well as inspiration for attacks.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rahami, accused of carrying out bombings in New York and New Jersey last weekend, had drawn federal attention after he traveled to Pakistan and his father reported concerns.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Julia Preston, William K. Rashbaum, Eli Rosenberg, Eric Schmitt, Nate Schweber and Benjamin Weiser. Doris Burke contributed research.
byline.original: By MARC SANTORA, RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and ADAM GOLDMAN

headline.main: Ahmad Khan Rahami’s YouTube Account Listed Jihad Videos, Complaint Says

snippet: Two of the 96 videos listed under his favorites were related to jihad, while the others included romantic ballads and do-it-yourself videos....
lead_paragraph: Two of the 96 videos listed under his favorites were related to jihad, while the others included romantic ballads and do-it-yourself videos.
